pages.text: This update consists of a few minor additions:$(li)Battle Log: Keeps track of the battle, and dispenses an item at the end of the battle. Inserting it into a Battle Viewer will quickly replay the match so you can rewatch it.$(li)Simple AI: Enables you to play against AI so that you can still play in single player.

Hard AI structures may generate in the level that each player can beat once for great rewards. $(li)Admin Ships: Creative only Tier 7 ships with amped up abilities. These are really just for fun and will be stupidly overpowered.
